definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
3rd earthly branch: 3-5 a.m., 1st solar month (4th February-5th March), year of the Tiger/ancient Chinese compass point: 60°
play/show/performance/exhibition/to perform/to act/to demonstrate/CL:場|场[chang3]
to direct/director (film etc)
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
actor or actress/performer/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to play the role of/to act
lecture/to make a speech
to screen (a movie)/to stage (a play)/a screening/a staging
vocal recital or concert
maneuver/exercise/practice/to maneuver
sung performance/to sing for an audience
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
to do a drill/to practice/training/drill
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
performing arts

sentences.english: He is perfect as the sensitive but strong reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他把一个敏感而言词犀利的记者演得完美无缺。

sentences.english: I do not know now is that his own play.
sentences.chinese: 到现在我都不知道自己演的是那一出戏。

sentences.english: The play went on until the candles went out.
I only watch when there's western on.
sentences.chinese: 只有演西部片的时候我才看。

sentences.english: Last season was a humiliating homecoming.
sentences.chinese: 上赛季荣归故里是演砸了。

sentences.english: When the film became very exciting, Tom and Sally would hold their breath.
sentences.chinese: 电影演到激动人心处时，汤姆和萨莉就会屏住呼吸。

sentences.english: Singing in front of speech movements, Tsai Yu-Shuang behind Sound.
sentences.chinese: 高歌在前面演动作，蔡雨爽在后面伴音。

sentences.english: Was there any negative feedback on your sex scenes or for playing a lesbian?
sentences.chinese: 演拉拉或拍床戏，有没有得过任何负面的回响？

sentences.english: I want you to play one of my songs.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们演一首我的歌。

sentences.english: Did the movie go on until midnight?

sentences.chinese: 他正在练习演“哈姆雷特”以便临时代替别人。

sentences.english: Would you not rather have your precious little ingenue?
sentences.chinese: 你们不想让你们那个机灵的小宝贝演主角了？

sentences.english: She is a Chaplin nut ：She's seen all his films.
sentences.chinese: 她是卓别林的癖好者，凡他演的电影都看过。

sentences.english: She came in the middle of a French costume picture.
sentences.chinese: 她进来时正在演一个法国古装戏。

sentences.english: We really liked each other and we hit it off, you know?
sentences.chinese: 我们正好很投缘，所以演得很顺，你知道吗？

sentences.english: There are some things I really cannot read, is you're too fake, or I am silly.
sentences.chinese: 有些事我实在看不懂，是你演的太假，还是我本就傻。
